data.message:
First of all i dont speak english as a native tounge so sry for bad grammar :P
Yeah you are most probably not gonna read this but fuck it....
Your song Bad Guy is amazing and a video idea just hit me.The storyline is preaty straightforwrd.It begins with him being annoyed by your music and his fucked up life so he decides to take it all on you.Literarly!!
So he comes to your house and reaches his gratested potencial..he peaked(That part made me laugh like crazy when i heard it the first time so pls make it weary funny).
Anyhow he goes around your back door and opes it,grabes you and throwes you in a trunk..Now he gets all crazy and shit cops appear and he fall in a river..
Time slows down
Your inner voice is heard(The one from My Darling)making you get up and fight
you open your ayes and time speeds up you beggin fighting for your life..somehow you manage to open a trunk swim off to Matthey Mitchel and save him as well...
The song should end by the time you get to the shore(coust i dunno)...
Man this shit was long :D
So yeah i dont want any credit for this id just like you to sand me some msg so id know you read it lie ok or something and it would made me realy happy if youd make a video for Bad Guy
